title: Music randomly resumes
content:
Media randy resumes after several hours idle.

Listening to music via Android Auto in the car. Several hours later, phone is sat on a counter in the house and it resumes playback with no interaction at all. It's occured a few times now 

This is really frustrating. Never had this problem before, every new pixel comes with new problems. I'm really tired of Google laxk of QA.
